name: The Wizard Ran 7
description:
• Next chapter: TBA
  • Previous chapter
  • First chapter

The seventh and penultimate episode in the wizard's adventures! The wizard was sent in an underground hell to better understand the horrors of this world. Will he make it out a better person? Features 3 new playable characters!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact
  • WARRIOR: spacebar to attack pawns diagonally
  • SAPPER: left click to throw bombs
  • SHEPARD: you are not special.
  • R: Restart room
  • M: hold to bring out map
  • B: not anymore
